projects.title: NeuralLink Gateway v2.0
projects.description: Low-latency bridge for biometric data processing and real-time visualization.
projects.details: Developed a messaging-safe DMA controller in Rust to interface with CAN bus sensors. By implementing a custom RTOS-based scheduler and a hardware-accelerated FFT pipeline, we reduced data jitter by 40% compared to industry standards.

projects.title: Embedded RTOS Core
projects.description: Bare-metal firmware and RTOS development with sub-millisecond precision for industrial hardware.
projects.details: Engineered a custom RTOS kernel optimized for ARM Cortex-M4 with priority-based preemptive scheduling. Achieved 168 MHz clock speed with 99.9% uptime in production environments.

projects.title: Smart Sensor Array
projects.description: Multi-sensor fusion system for environmental monitoring with edge AI processing.
projects.details: Integrated temperature, humidity, and air quality sensors with TinyML models running on ESP32. Implemented MQTT protocol for real-time data streaming to cloud dashboard.

projects.title: Industrial IoT Hub
projects.description: Scalable IoT gateway for industrial automation with secure OTA updates.
projects.details: Built a robust IoT gateway supporting 128+ concurrent device connections. Implemented AES-256 encryption for secure data transmission and remote firmware updates.

projects.title: Real-Time Motor Controller
projects.description: High-precision motor control system with PID tuning and fault detection.
projects.details: Developed a brushless DC motor controller with FOC algorithm achieving 0.4ms response time. Integrated safety features including overcurrent protection and thermal monitoring.

projects.title: Brand Identity System
projects.description: Complete brand identity design for tech startup including logo, color palette, and guidelines.
projects.details: Created a comprehensive brand system with modular design components. Delivered logo variations, typography system, color palette, and 50-page brand guidelines.

projects.title: UI/UX Dashboard Kit
projects.description: Modern dashboard UI kit with 100+ components and dark mode support.
projects.details: Designed a comprehensive dashboard kit with reusable components, charts, tables, and forms. Implemented design system with atomic design principles.

projects.title: Motion Graphics Reel
projects.description: Collection of animated graphics and visual effects for digital media.
projects.details: Created 20+ motion graphics pieces including logo animations, explainer videos, and social media content. Used After Effects and Cinema 4D for 3D elements.

projects.title: Product Visualization Suite
projects.description: High-fidelity 3D product renders and interactive visualizations.
projects.details: Produced photorealistic 3D renders for product launches. Implemented interactive 360Â° viewers with WebGL for e-commerce integration.

projects.title: Flux Dashboard
projects.description: High-performance data visualization interface for complex telemetry systems.
projects.details: Built a real-time dashboard with React and D3.js handling 10,000+ data points per second. Implemented WebSocket connections for live updates and custom chart components.

projects.title: Interactive Portfolio Engine
projects.description: Modern portfolio platform with terminal interface and dynamic content loading.
projects.details: Developed a Next.js-based portfolio with custom terminal emulator, lazy-loaded projects, and system boot-up animations. Optimized for performance with 95+ Lighthouse score.

projects.title: E-Commerce Platform
projects.description: Full-featured online store with cart, checkout, and payment integration.
projects.details: Built a scalable e-commerce platform with Next.js, Stripe integration, and headless CMS. Implemented product search, filtering, and responsive design for mobile commerce.
